[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Usability Enhancement System (UES) defines requirements for a user-friendly platform focused on error reduction and real-time feedback.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: UES provides an intuitive web and mobile platform, ensuring accessibility, usability, and efficiency.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: UES integrates with cloud-based user management and analytics tools.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: UES supports a responsive UI for web and mobile.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: UES is compatible with desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: UES utilizes RESTful APIs for user interactions and tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: UES ensures secure HTTPS/TLS 1.3 data transmission.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: UES optimizes real-time responsiveness and processing.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: UES supports high availability via cloud scaling.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: UES supports accessibility, multilingual settings, and adaptive themes.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: UES links to authentication services, analytics, and cloud storage.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: UES minimizes errors, offers real-time guidance, and supports analytics for user behavior.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: UES is designed for users of all technical levels, ensuring ease of use.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: UES requires stable internet connectivity for real-time tracking and updates.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: UES depends on third-party authentication and analytics services.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall support OAuth 2.0 authentication.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall track analytics via third-party services.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall provide a user-friendly UI with intuitive navigation (REQ-USAB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall track user interactions and provide real-time error feedback.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall support personalized UI customization.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The UI shall minimize errors by providing hints, contextual guidance, and feedback.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The system shall comply with WCAG and provide an accessible experience.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall load within 2 seconds under normal conditions.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall process user inputs within 300ms and complete schedule generation within 30s.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store user preferences, history, and analytics.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall log interactions, error reports, and activity patterns.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with WCAG accessibility standards.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The system shall encrypt all user data using AES-256.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall follow ISO 25010 usability standards.
[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-002: The system shall comply with GDPR for user data protection.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall support automated usability testing.
[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall maintain 99.9% uptime with 8 AM - 6 PM availability.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests UI usability, error tracking, and performance. Validates accessibility compliance.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Usability reports, API documentation, and error tracking guidelines.
